title: 3 and Out - Niners/Trey Lance OTA Observations; Idiot Fan Outbreak; NFL Rapid Fire; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Niners/Trey Lance OTA Observations; Idiot Fan Outbreak; NFL Rapid Fire; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John relays his observations from his trip to Niners OTA's, the reality of seeing Josh Rosen fighting for his NFL life and his first impressions of Trey Lance. He also looks at the recent media frenzy over bad fan behavior in other sports, attacks the top headlines with some NFL rapid fire, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
